comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: The former Marguerite Vivian Burton of Burlington NJ; she married Baron Walter von Radeck  in 1912, then divorced him to marry Count Christian Gunther von Bernstorff, son of the German Ambassador to the US, in 1917. There was a lawsuit between the Baron and the Count in 1918.  Vivian and the Count divorced in 1924.
